title: Home Network Security in Ocala, FL
headline: Protect your household from scams, spying, and insecure smart devices. Use the same tools trusted by security professionals.
description: Protect your home network in Ocala with expert Wi-Fi hardening, DNS filtering, and smart device isolation. Local I.T. services from certified cybersecurity professionals.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Smart TVs, voice assistants, and other connected devices often send usage and behavioral data back to manufacturers, sometimes in real time. These devices can silently collect data about your home, habits, and even the other devices on your network.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Secure your Wi-Fi with hardened router configurations
Block ads, trackers, and known malware with DNS filtering
Segment smart devices using VLANs or separate SSIDs
Deploy Pi-hole, Unbound, or custom firewall rules
Set up parental controls, filtering, or private routing

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: After an on-site assessment, we customize your network using open-source tools and best practices. No cloud logins, no bloatware, no ongoing subscriptions. All configurations are explained in plain English, so you remain in control.
